author: Darwin Romero
description:
Very glad to be onboarding more than 20 members to our Applaudo Studios team of 10X developers this week. This adds to our team of already ~500 FTEs in 14 Countries.

At Applaudo Studios, we are solving the remote and distributed teams problem. DAAS ‚Äì Development As A Service, is the future of work.

Tech and innovation are leading the world. Latin America has the talent to fuel this tech revolution. Applaudo Studios is the end-to-end people solution to it.

#softwarecompany #saasgrowth #latamdigital #technews #futureofwork #remotework #remotejobs

author: Darwin Romero
description:
Solving for Tech Talent will be a key problem to solve for the next 10 years. Most tech companies will not be able to grow without the right #TechTalent accelerating those product roadmaps.

If we don't disrupt the Tech Talent problem, in the next 10 years we will have a massive workforce shortage, worldwide.

At Applaudo, our core product - Development As A Service - solves the #FutureOfWork and #RemoteWork challenges as an end-to-end solution. We take the hassle, complexity and burden of hiring and retaining Latin America‚Äôs top tech talent.

Growing more than 175% YoY we can say: The Future of work is here, Development-As-A-Service is here.
